title: Time to reach maximum value with new inductor

content.prompt: Time t is the time it takes the current of an LR circuit with an inductor of inductance L and a resistor of resistance R to reach half of its maximum value. What is the new time if the original inductor is replaced with an inductor of inductance 2L ?

topic.text: 13.5: Circuits with Resistors and Inductors (LR Circuits)

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
